    Retirement Security in this Day and Age

    TAGS:   Business/Entrepreneurship, Ideation

    + View More - View Less
    4/27/12
    5/27/12
    $500 USD
    24
    Brainstorm Challengeβeta
    Share

    How do we best get people to understand how important it is to plan for, and take specific action steps today, to create a steady and reliable stream of income for their retirement years? What would be the best, most compelling way to spur people to take important action for themselves TODAY in this very important arena - in a way  that does not overwhelm people with the complex issues involved in this topic?

    Read Challenge Details  »

    Intellectual Property:  In return for the Initial Transfer Fee of $600 per compound, you are expected to grant the Seeker only a non-exclusive license to use your compound for internal, research purposes (for example, researching the molecule’s properties or preparing derivatives of the molecule).

    Neutralization of Carbon Nanotubes (CNTs) with Metallic Properties

    TAGS:   Chemistry, Physical Sciences, RTP

    + View More - View Less
    4/24/12
    7/24/12
    $50,000 USD
    80
     
    Team
    Share Referral: $5,000 USD

    Carbon Nanotubes (CNTs) grown by Chemical Vapor Deposition statistically have 2/3 with semiconductor properties and 1/3 with metallic properties. We are looking for ways to remove or electronically neutralize CNT’s with metallic properties such that the CNT array acts as a semiconductor. 

    Read Challenge Details  »

    Source:  InnoCentive      Challenge ID:   9932822   

     
    Team
    Share Referral: $5,000 USD

    Encore Pets: Marketing ideas needed for nonprofit to reach elusive pet owners

    TAGS:   Business/Entrepreneurship, Ideation

    + View More - View Less
    4/16/12
    5/16/12
    $500 USD
    450
    Brainstorm Challengeβeta
    Share

    Our local volunteer pet rescue organization has been able to purchase a mobile spay/neuter clinic to serve our largely rural sparsely populated county. We have made significant gains in regards to pet overpopulation in the larger towns of the county, but still have a large segment of residents who we have not reached or convinced to spay/neuter their pets.

    How does a non-profit organization with a limited budget effectively reach pet owners who rarely use veterinarians, are not required to register pets, typically do not read the local newspaper or listen to local media news,  and rarely participate in local community events in order to convince them to use our low cost spay/neuter services?

    Read Challenge Details  »

    Source:  InnoCentive      Challenge ID:   10300000014   

    Brainstorm Challengeβeta
    Share
     
    Imparting Durability/ Adhesion to Superhydrophobic Silica Coatings

    TAGS:   Chemistry, Engineering/Design, Physical Sciences, RTP

    + View More - View Less
    4/06/12
    5/07/12
    $50,000 USD
    297
     
    Team
    Share Referral: $5,000 USD

    The Seeker has a super hydrophobic coating. The coating is replicable, but has very limited durability. Many avenues have been pursued to impart durability/promote adhesion; however, these paths have not resulted in a coating with acceptable performance.  We are seeking a solution that will enable the coating to be more durable as defined in the solution requirements.

    Read Challenge Details  »

    Source:  InnoCentive      Challenge ID:   9933042   

     
    Team
    Share Referral: $5,000 USD
     
    Stand Alone Field Measurement of Atmospheric Benzene & Butadiene

    TAGS:   Chemistry, Engineering/Design, Physical Sciences, Global Health, Public Good, Environment, Theoretical-licensing

    + View More - View Less
    4/04/12
    6/04/12
    $30,000 USD
    177
     
    Team
    Share Referral: $3,000 USD

    A method or technology is required that will enable sensitive, reproducible and rapid field-based monitoring of atmospheric benzene & 1,3 butadiene at low concentrations. These potent toxins needs to be detected in very low concentrations and the most sensitive methods of analysis currently require laborious sample collection and processing using laboratory-based instruments.

    This Challenge requires only a written proposal.

    Read Challenge Details  »

    Source:  InnoCentive      Challenge ID:   9932943

    Share Referral: $3,000 USD

    Source:  InnoCentive      Challenge ID:   10300000010   

    Brainstorm Challengeβeta
    Share
     
    Design of Novel Scaffolds for Inhibitors of Complex III (a.k.a. Cytochrome bc1, EC 1.10.2.2)

    TAGS:   Chemistry, Computer Science/Information Technology, Life Sciences, Nature, Ideation

    + View More - View Less
    4/03/12
    6/03/12
    $15,000 USD
    134
     
    Team
    Share Referral: $1,500 USD

    This Challenge seeks to identify novel scaffolds for inhibitors of Complex III  (a.k.a. Cytochrome bc1 or Coenzyme Q:cytochrome c – oxidoreductase; EC 1.10.2.2).  The Seeker is also interested in obtaining insight into recent advances in molecular modeling. They will therefore award solutions based on both their interest in the specific scaffolds as well as the novelty and validity of the modeling performed to arrive at the scaffolds.  The Seeker may consider ongoing collaboration with the winning Solver(s) of this Challenge on both this project as well as future molecular modeling efforts. 

    This is an Ideation Challenge with a guaranteed award for at least one submitted solution.

    Read Challenge Details  »
